actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To establish a freeze on bank fees for accounts held by average taxpayers.
short_title: Freeze on Bank Fees Act of 1995

summary.text: Freeze on Bank Fees Act of 1995 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit any insured depository institution from imposing any fee on the average non-corporate taxpayer account ($3,000 or less), for two years, for more than the amount imposed for such fee as of the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: Freeze on Bank Fees Act of 1995
To establish a freeze on bank fees for accounts held by average taxpayers.
